The game is thoroughly good, good mechanics, but the problem is that the theme of the game seems to affect too many young (?) players. There's really a lot of psychologically damaged kids coming out (as killers), or toxic survivors who just can't accept that there are also matches where they don't win. Most toxic community of gamers I've experienced so far, would not recommend playing this anymore until the community has figured out how to better deal with the results of the matches.

um jogo intuitivo e bem feito , uma jogabilidade simples e f√°cil de aprender , diversas formas de se divertir com os amigos e sozinho tamb√©m recomendo muito , at√© agora s√≥ achei chato o fato de demorar muito para achar partidas mas √© aceit√°vel .

i have 2 accounts, total of 900 hours, been playing since early access, there are still hackers, there are still desync issues, this game is not fun once you reach not red or purple ranks. The game forces you to use meta perks to be a viable killer or to live as survivor. Survivors have it insanely easy at higher ranks and the game no longer becomes fun as a "win" for killer is killing 2 people. If you enjoy raging at getting hit when the killer is no where near you, if you enjoy going up against a survive with friends and getting bullied by them, if you enjoy having your hex totems break at the beginning of every game, if you enjoy being forced to use meta perks to have any chance at winning therefore removing any creative builds, then Dead By Daylight is your game, otherwise, just stay away. The only way the devs are ever gonna fucking fix this game instead of adding new shit, is if people stop fucking playing it, which unfortunately doesnt seem like it will happen.
This game is a love-hate relationship at its finest.
Una obra maestra muy divertido y muy original recomendadisimo ideal para jugar con amigos! O hacer nuevos amigos
o jogo √© louco de creize, gostei muito, da pra voce sequestrar os sobreviventes e dar pro papai entidade, e se eles fugir ja era , divertido
